name: Furious Flappers
description: Your Flappers are furious and ready to kick some Hog butt. Help them destroy the evil Hogs by stretching your arms and flying in VR to bring peace to their world. Play through 36 unique levels, using 6 different Flappers, all with unique abilities, to destroy the Hogs! Shoot them using your slingshot, and then extend your arms and fly midair to direct your flight up, down, and sideways. Your Flappers can teleport, expand, explode, and much more! Destroy everything from small huts to enormous stone buildings with your flapping fury. Bonus points if you can finish levels with fewer birds, and finish them quickly too!
